thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 10 of 750
thread.title: Andrea
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Andrea

author: Andrea
title: Andrea
text:
It took about 45-50 mins to get my car. The poor desk staff were working so hard, and doing the very best they could but they were clearly very under staffed.
On my return back to Melbourne from regional Victoria I noticed my windscreen wiper blades were blunt AND there was no water in the windscreen washing tank. I had a very stressful 2 hour drive back to the city as it rained the whole way on and off and my visibility was extremely poor.
Sadly I wouldn't use Redspot again.
